scripts.build: npm-run-all --parallel build:copy build:compile-app build:compile-worker build:apple-touch-icon build:apple-startup-image
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p build && cp -r src/index.html src/manifest.webmanifest src/images build/
scripts.build:apple-startup-image: node --input-type=module -e "import sharp from 'sharp'; sharp({ create: { width: 1125, height: 2436, channels: 3, background: { r: 35, g: 35, b: 50 } } }).toFile('build/images/apple-startup-image.png')"
